title: Uptime Kuma
name: Uptime Kuma
overview:
Uptime Kuma is a self-hosted monitoring tool like Uptime Robot.

Features:

- Monitoring uptime for HTTP(s) / TCP / HTTP(s) Keyword / Ping / DNS Record / Push / Steam Game Server.
- Fancy, Reactive, Fast UI/UX.
- Notifications via Telegram, Discord, Gotify, Slack, Pushover, Email (SMTP), and 70+ notification services.
- 20 second intervals.
- Multi Languages
- Simple Status Page
- Ping Chart
- Certificate Info
releaseNotes:
This release includes many new features and improvements.

New features:
  - Added Jira Service Management as a notification provider
  - Added Google Sheets notification provider
  - Added Globalping support
  - Added Bavarian German language support


Improvements:
  - Discord notifications now support custom messages and format presets
  - Ntfy notifications now support custom title and message templates
  - Slack notifications can now include monitor group names
  - Improved monitor list selection behavior
  - Expand/collapse all groups now works with nested groups


Bug fixes:
  - Fixed certificate expiry handling
  - Fixed RSS pubDate timezone issues
  - Fixed monitor names being hidden by tags
  - Improved RADIUS client error handling and socket cleanup
  - Improved MongoDB monitor error handling
  - Added input validation for monitor ID in badge endpoints


Full release notes can be found at https://github.com/louislam/uptime-kuma/releases
